name: Hallway 1
long: You are in a wide, brightly lit hallway. Next to it are the trophy cases with many awards and pictures. There is a banner here about an upcoming event. At the north end is the detention room. On the west is the main office. Across on the east side is the janitor office, also known as the broom closet. The library is to the south.
short: A wide bright hall with trophies and banners.
addl: A train whistle sounds across the lonely field
